title: I just need 3 RP
body: Riot can you please give me just 3 RP  then i can buy a hextech box and key and then i can get a skin pleasee i really want it it is just 3 RP

replies.body: We might be able to help out with this!  Unfortunately, we can't on the boards but please reach out to player support by [submitting a ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)or twitter via @RiotSupport.  Good luck!
